attributes.action: Introduce a Law that all future motorists must NOT BE FORCED take and pass a CBT and ride a moped/scooter or motorbike on the public highways for at least a year before being allowed to take a vehicle test for driving cars, vans lorries etc
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to counter balance the other petition because I believe how ever well meaning, it is flawed in that a lot of people dont have the neccessary skills to ride a moped, scooter or motorcycle. it would be an unneccassary expense on already limited resources and so many more inexperienced riders on the road would cause more accidents. further it would be difficult to force people to actually ride them other than for the actual cbt. then a machine could simply be locked away taxed and insured for a year.
